ygData.subject: Re: fight?
ygData.msgSnippet: The tiger hears the howls and smells the wolf.  It s face almost showed a smile. It crouched lower and waited perfectly still, hidden by the tall grass.

The tiger hears the howls and smells the wolf.  It's face almost 
showed a smile. It crouched lower and waited perfectly still, hidden 
by the tall grass.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine silently moves through the tall grass circling the Tiger, 
> he stays low and lets out a Deep, low howl.
> 
> Lunarpine doesn't want to kill the creature unless he has to, this 
> could be the ancestor of somebodys pet.
>
